mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_hot_good (hot_good_code, good_code, good_name, hot_sort, is_delete, create_user, create_time, version) values ( #{hotGoodCode}, #{goodCode}, #{goodName}, #{hotSort}, 0, #{createUser}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update t_sys_hot_good set good_name = #{goodName}, hot_sort = #{hotSort}, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and version = #{version} and hot_good_code = #{hotGoodCode}
update t_sys_hot_good set is_delete = 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and hot_good_code = #{hotGoodCode}
mapper.select: select * from t_sys_hot_good where is_delete = 0 and hot_good_code = #{hotGoodCode}

select * from t_sys_hot_good where is_delete = 0
and good_code like concat('%', #{goodCode}, '%')
and good_name like concat('%', #{goodName}, '%')
order by hot_good_code
